components.name: Tooling
components.description: Items related to Alloy tooling and workflow

fields.description:
I am aware of the alloy.jmk file. 

As there are already a few build "plugins' (e.g. jade, coffeescript) and conceivably more in the future (e.g. tss precompiler) it would be good if they could be dropped into an alloy project without mashing the single alloy.jmk file. E.g. jade.jmk, coffee.jmk, etc.
